

Window Arguments to find window:

	class_name=None,
                  class_name_re=None,
                  parent=None,
                  process=None,
                  title=None,
                  title_re=None,
                  top_level_only=True,
                  visible_only=True,
                  enabled_only=False,
                  best_match=None,
                  handle=None,
                  ctrl_index=None,
                  found_index=None,
                  predicate_func=None,
                  active_only=False,
                  control_id=None,
                  control_type=None,
                  auto_id=None,
                  framework_id=None,
                  backend=None,
                  depth=None
